20101211050539.000|20101211050541.000|CCO|AS D ORDERS IN 2009.

20101211050725.000|20101211050727.000|CCO|COME UNDER A LOT OF SCRUTINY.
20101211050727.000|20101211050729.000|CCO|124 SAFETY VIOLATIONS RIGHT UP

20101211050736.000|20101211050737.667|CCO|OVER THE PAST FIVE YEARS.
20101211050737.667|20101211050739.333|CCO|I MEAN, IS MASSEY A BAD PLAYER?

20101211050741.000|20101211050742.429|CCO|THEY'RE A BAD PLAYER.

20101211050804.333|20101211050806.000|CCO|TO T WE LOOK AT THE TOTALITY OF

20101211050812.667|20101211050814.333|CCO|HOW CAN A MINE OR COMPANY BE 
20101211050814.333|20101211050816.000|CCO|ALLOWED TO OPERATE?

20101211050817.667|20101211050819.333|CCO|VIOLATIONS, BOTH MAJOR AND 
20101211050819.333|20101211050821.000|CCO|MINOR.
20101211050821.000|20101211050823.000|CCO|THE COMPANY DOES SO, BLANKENSHIP
20101211050823.000|20101211050825.000|CCO|SAYS, BECAUSE IT OFTEN DISAGREES
20101211050825.000|20101211050827.000|CCO|WITH THE INSPECTOR OR SEES THE 
20101211050827.000|20101211050829.000|CCO|PENALTY AS UNFAIR.

20101211050831.000|20101211050832.429|CCO|ITS PEOPLE ARE THE BEST TRAINED,
20101211050832.429|20101211050833.857|CCO|MOST PRODUCTIVE AND SAFEST 
20101211050833.857|20101211050835.286|CCO|MINERS IN THE WORLD. 
20101211050835.286|20101211050836.714|CCO|>> AT MASSEY, SAFETY AND 
20101211050836.714|20101211050838.143|CCO|TECHNOLOGY GO HAND IN HAND.
20101211050838.143|20101211050839.571|CCO|I'VE NEVER BEEN MORE PROUD TO BE
20101211050839.571|20101211050841.000|CCO|A MASSEY MEMBER. 
20101211050841.000|20101211050843.000|CCO|>> FOLLOWING THE UPPER BIG 
20101211050843.000|20101211050845.000|CCO|BRANCH BLAST, MASSEY RELEASED 
20101211050845.000|20101211050847.000|CCO|THESE SPOTS ON ITS WEBSITE,

20101211051638.143|20101211051639.571|CCO|THAT CAN EXIST DEEP IN A COAL 
20101211051639.571|20101211051641.000|CCO|MINE.
20101211051641.000|20101211051643.000|CCO|COAL MINING CAUSES THE CREATION 
20101211051643.000|20101211051645.000|CCO|OF COAL DUST AND THE RELEASE OF 
20101211051645.000|20101211051647.000|CCO|METHANE GAS.

20101211051649.000|20101211051651.000|CCO|CORRECTLY CONTROLLED.
20101211051651.000|20101211051652.667|CCO|COAL DUST CAN BE MADE 
20101211051652.667|20101211051654.333|CCO|NONEXPLOSIVE BY APPLYING 
20101211051654.333|20101211051656.000|CCO|INCOMBUSTIBLE ROCK DUST TO A 
20101211051656.000|20101211051657.667|CCO|MINE.
20101211051657.667|20101211051659.333|CCO|METHANE GAS IS ELIMINATED BY 
20101211051659.333|20101211051701.000|CCO|PROPER VENTILATION. 
20101211051701.000|20101211051703.500|CCO|>> THE FAILURE TO VENTILATE 
20101211051703.500|20101211051706.000|CCO|PROPERLY, THE FAILURE TO REMOVE 
20101211051706.000|20101211051708.500|CCO|OR MAKE INERT COAL DUST AND THE

20101211053334.333|20101211053336.000|CCO|MICROWORK, SMALL, DIGITAL TASKS 
20101211053336.000|20101211053337.667|CCO|THAT CAN BE DONE ON A CHEAP 
20101211053337.667|20101211053339.333|CCO|COMPUTER.
20101211053339.333|20101211053341.000|CCO|TO THOSE MOST OFTEN EXCLUDED 
20101211053341.000|20101211053342.667|CCO|FROM THE GLOBAL WORKFORCE.
20101211053342.667|20101211053344.333|CCO|WOMEN, USE AND REFUGEES. 
20101211053344.333|20101211053346.000|CCO|>> WE'RE BUILDING WORK

20101211054216.000|20101211054251.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101211054216.000|20101211054221.000|CCO|>>> A WATCH LIST INVESTIGATION.
20101211054221.000|20101211054223.000|CCO|IN TEXAS, A DEADLY GAS PIPELINE
